    ChallengeEventLoggingListener
    Demonstrates listening to challenge events for audit/logging.

    Sample block handler showcasing how to return a structured HTTP 403 response instead of throwing.

    Example application handler that demonstrates customizing challenge responses.

    Demo filter that illustrates how an application might project user identifiers into different carriers.
    ExampleUserIdResolverConfiguration
    Example configuration that demonstrates how a single composite resolver can try multiple user id sources in a defined order.

    Explicit Redis client configuration for the example app so Redis usage works out-of-the-box when Docker provides the server.
